name: math-minor-declare
description: Explains how CSC students add a math minor.

events.content: Who signs the math minor form if you're in CSC? Advisor or department chair?
Fill out the minor declaration on the Math website, then get your CSC faculty advisor to sign before you drop it at the Math office (25-208).
Make sure you've completed Calc III and Linear Algebra first; otherwise they won't accept it.
